Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Everything was good. The location of the hotel is the main advantage. It’s 100 m to supermarket, 500 m to metro "Republica". Good restaurant is next door. All main POI are within 30 min of walking. Very close to Via Nazionale, but quiet. I’d recommend to all who's looking for a big room with the kitchen in the center of Rome.

Reviews.Title: “hotel in rome”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Our room includes airconditioning but we got only a fan. It's good that the weather is not so warm that we open the window for fresh air!!!!!! It's so frustrating!!!!!!! The coffee cups are all cheap plastics that your coffe tasts bad, that's so rediculous!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel,exactly as it is in the fotos and in very good and safe location.it was a very big studio apartment and very clean.i certanly reccomended.

Reviews.Title: “Great value but unavailable service”
Reviews.Author: JJ321
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this serviced apartment for 5 days, it was a one bedroom apartment, very clean with full kitchen. And it was 70 euro per night. However, it was hard to find help when we needed something because the desk hour is from 2pm to 9 pm even though it says the service is available from 10 am, but the cleaning lady doesn't speak English. However, we left our bag pack at the hotel when we checked out 6 am in the morning, took us a while to reached someone on the phone to get help, but eventually we got it back. Highly recommend if you think service is not a big issue for your stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Soggiorno Europa
HotelInfo.Address: Via Genova 24, 00184 Rome, Italy
